meanings.definition: Having a great deal of money, resources, or assets.
meanings.sent1: The man became wealthier after winning the lottery.
meanings.sent2: She was wealthier than her neighbors due to her successful business.
meanings.sent3: The wealthy cat decided to buy a diamond-studded collar.
meanings.sent4: The garden bloomed with wealthier flowers than the rest of the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The mansion on the hill was a symbol of the town's wealthier residents.

meanings.definition: More prosperous or well-off than others.
meanings.sent1: Their family grew wealthier with each successful investment.
meanings.sent2: The wealthier countries often provide aid to those in need.
meanings.sent3: The wealthier students always had the latest gadgets in school.
meanings.sent4: The sunsets in the wealthier part of town seemed more vibrant.
meanings.sent5: The wealthier neighborhoods had beautifully landscaped gardens.
